name: ONLY ONE SPELL
description:
In this unfinished game, your task is to clear the dungeon, but as luck would have it, you spend all the spells and you only have a magic crystal that you can throw at enemies. Will you be able to clear the dungeon with a piece of mineral or will you be doomed to death?

W,A,S,D - move

Left Shift - dash

LMB - shoot

ESC - pause

alt+f4 - close window

to select a crystal, come closer to it
